title: The Chase for Choronzon
description: A zany chase through time and space and between the worlds to put the universe back in order, if they live to accomplish their task!The demon Choronzon was supposed to keep the gate between the worlds, but he has abandoned his post and it's up to two reincarnated magicians, Karl Spare and Alei-Cat, to capture him and return him to his post.A romp through time and space takes these two unlikely heroes through some harrowing portals and surreal adventures where they meet a variety of bizarre personages along the way, but there can be only one finale to the chase for Choronzon!
author: Jaq D. Hawkins
